languages.text: "Премного благодарен! И знайте — за мной не заржавеет, если получу наследство — отблагодарю, чем смогу".
"Much obliged! And know that I'll make it worth your while. If I get the inheritance, I'll express my gratitude in whatever way I can."
languages.original_text: "Премного благодарен! И знайте — за мной не заржавеет, если получу наследство — отблагодарю, чем смогу".

traits.locale_text: "Much obliged! And know that I'll make it worth your while. If I get the inheritance, I'll express my thanks in whatever way I can."
"Much obliged! And know that I'll make it worth your while. If I get the inheritance, I'll express my thanks in whatever way I can."
"Much obliged! And know that I'll make it worth your while. If I get the inheritance, I'll express my gratitude in whatever way I can."
"Much obliged! And know that I'll make it worth your while. If I get the inheritance, I'll express my gratitude in whatever way I can."
"Much obliged! And know that I'll make it worth your while. If I get the inheritance, I'll express my gratitude in whatever way I can."

languages.text: “太感谢了！我向你保证，我绝对不会让你白忙一趟。只要我得到了遗产，我愿意以任何方式来表达我的感激之情。”
languages.original_text: "Much obliged! And know that I'll make it worth your while. If I get the inheritance, I'll express my gratitude in whatever way I can."

traits.locale_text: “太感谢了！我向你保证，我绝对不会让你白忙一趟。只要我得到了遗产，我愿意以任何方式来表达我的感激之情。”

languages.text: «¡Se lo agradezco mucho! Haré que le merezca la pena. Si consigo la herencia, le demostraré mi gratitud de todas las formas que pueda».
languages.original_text: "Much obliged! And know that I'll make it worth your while. If I get the inheritance, I'll express my gratitude in whatever way I can."

traits.locale_text: «¡Se lo agradezco mucho! Haré que le merezca la pena. Si consigo la herencia, le demostraré mi gratitud de todas las formas que pueda».

languages.text: 「感謝するぜ！俺も手伝うからさ。もし俺が遺産を引き継いだら、俺にできる形で礼をさせてもらう」
languages.original_text: "Much obliged! And know that I'll make it worth your while. If I get the inheritance, I'll express my gratitude in whatever way I can."

traits.locale_text: 「感謝するぜ！俺も手伝うからさ。もし俺が遺産を引き継いだら、俺にできる形で礼をさせてもらう」

languages.text: "Besten Dank! Und wisset, dass es sich für Euch lohnen wird. Wenn ich das Erbe erhalte, werde ich meiner Dankbarkeit auf alle erdenkliche Art Ausdruck verleihen."
languages.original_text: "Much obliged! And know that I'll make it worth your while. If I get the inheritance, I'll express my gratitude in whatever way I can."

traits.locale_text: "Besten Dank! Und wisset, dass es sich für Euch lohnen wird. Wenn ich das Erbe erhalte, werde ich meiner Dankbarkeit auf alle erdenkliche Art Ausdruck verleihen."

languages.text: « Je vous remercie ! Si l'héritage me revient, sachez que je ferai tout mon possible pour vous exprimer ma gratitude. »
languages.original_text: "Much obliged! And know that I'll make it worth your while. If I get the inheritance, I'll express my gratitude in whatever way I can."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous remercie ! Si l'héritage me revient, sachez que je ferai tout mon possible pour vous exprimer ma gratitude. »

languages.text: "Minnettarım! Zahmetinize değeceğinden kuşkunuz olmasın. Mirasa kavuşursam minnetimi mümkün olan her şekilde gösteririm."
languages.original_text: "Much obliged! And know that I'll make it worth your while. If I get the inheritance, I'll express my gratitude in whatever way I can."

traits.locale_text: "Minnettarım! Bana ayırdığınız vaktin karşılığını alacaksınız. Mirası ben alırsam size minnettarlığımı nasıl olursa olsun ödeyeceğim."
